raw_body: PERERA – HARINDA (H.C.). (Habib Bank). Dearly beloved husband of Saruchi and father of Mireya,​ brother of Aruni,​ brother-in-law of Suren,​ Jithendra and Ruwanthi,​ son of late Indra and Chintha. Cortege leaves residence on 4th October at 4.15 p.m. Cremation at General Cemetery Kanatte at 5.00 p.m. The remains will be at 50/​3,​ Siripa Road,​ Colombo 5.062359
